problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, a point P on the diagonal BD is EF ∥ BC, GH ∥ AB, and CG=2BG,S~△BPG~=N_0, then S~parallelogram AEPH~ = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵EF∥BC,GH∥AB,∴四边形HPFD、BEPG、AEPH、CFPG为平行四边形,∴S~△PEB~=S~△BGP~,同理可得S~△PHD~=S~△DFP~,S~△ABD~=S~△CDB~,∴S~△ABD~-S~△PEB~-S~△PHD~=S~△CDB~-S~△BGP~-S~△DFP~,即S~四边形AEPH~=S~四边形PFCG~．∵CG=2BG,S~△BPG~=1,∴S~四边形AEPH~=S~四边形PFCG~=4×1=4,故选:B．
